stories.text:
Hi there,
I am a high school student who is applying to college relatively soon. I am currently looking for universities/colleges that have both strong music programs, specifically for jazz, and strong compsci education programs. I have found a few colleges that seem to fit this, but my research has generally not turned up a ton of results.
Any help is appreciated.
Thank you
stories.title: Ask HN: Colleges with both good compsci and music
How I Helped Hack Democracy (Christopher Wylie, 2019)
Russian Navy's massive submarine could set the stage for a new oceanic Cold war
LinkNYC WiFi kiosks are hubs for pervs and vagrants, business leaders say

stories.text:
I have a weird claw-type typing method where I use the majority of my left hand and mostly my thumb/pointer on my right hand. I have a solid WPM and low error rate but one thing I was informed was that I am very heavy on my key presses, even with a mechanical keyboard (Cherry MX Browns).

Has anyone successfully re-molded their typing habits to be a bit more ergonomic?
stories.title: Ask HN: Re-learn home row/proper/more ergonomic typing fundamentals?
